content: this legal case involved a dispute over coownership of a property the case went through two instances of court first in the municipal court šibenik and then in the county court pula the procedure started on 2401 and lasted for 3 years and 6 months the coownership was resolved through a geometric division with the petitioner receiving a 13 share and the proposed party receiving a 23 share the court based its decision on the property act and a surveyors opinion the dispute also involved the costs of the procedure which the court ordered the proposed party to compensate for 23 of the court found that the contested decision was correct and lawful and that the court of first instance had made material violations of the civil procedure act the court determined the costs of the decision based on the coownership shares as there was no special agreement between the parties overall the court correctly applied the law in resolving the coownership dispute and determining the necessary costs of termination
